name: getAllStatuses
description:
Returns the valid statuses for a project. The statuses are grouped by issue type, as each project has a set of valid issue types and each issue type has a set of valid statuses.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Browse Projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project.

projectIdOrKey.description: The project ID or project key (case sensitive).

$block: Status details for an issue type.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the issue type.
**name**: The name of the issue type.
**self**: The URL of the issue type's status details.
**statuses**: List of status details for the issue type.
**subtask**: Whether this issue type represents subtasks.
